Articles.Content: What exactly determines a part can or cannot be 1st part of a vessel? Can't seem to find a pattern here.
Whatever the developers enabled the flag on. Control pods seem to always work, at least. I don't think there is any real pattern for the fuel tanks, control parts, etc.
I'm asking because parts I make sometimes are allowed to 1st part, sometimes not, even if they are command pods.

I think there's two requirements:

1. Has stack nodes.

2. Things can be radially attached to it.

Could be wrong, but I think that's how it works.

Forgot about something. I remember someone made a mod which enabled all stock parts to be the root of a vessel, despite not meeting those rules. You might want to search for that and see how it worked.

Anyway, you're welcome.

I think it' stored in the attachRules variable in the part files.

In other words, it's set by the creator of the part.
